en: {Player}'s house
You want the HELIX FOSSIL?
YOU got the HELIX FOSSIL!
All right. Then this is mine!
YES
NO

NAME is
playing the SNES!
...Okay!
It\cs time to go!
es:
{Player} está jugando a la NES!

Bueno, más vale que me ponga en marcha.

en:
Crammed full of
POKeMON books!
es: ¡Totalmente lleno de libros sobre los Pokémon!

en:
There\cs a movie
 on TV. Four boys
 are walking on
railroad tracks.

I better go too.
es:
Están poniendo una película. Salen cuatro niños caminando por las vías del tren.

Voy a ponerme en marcha.

en: {Rival}'s house

PALLET TOWN
Shades of your
journey await!

OAK POKeMON
RESEARCH LAB
es: Laboratorio de investigación de Pokémon del Profesor Oak

en:
Push START to
open the MENU!

The SAVE option is
on the MENU
screen.
es: La opción guardar está en la pantalla del menú.

en:
There\cs an e-mail
message here!

...

Calling all
POKeMON trainers!

The elite trainers
of POKeMON LEAGUE
are ready to take
on all comers!

Bring your best
POKeMON and see
how you rate as a
trainer!

POKeMON LEAGUE HQ
INDIGO PLATEAU

PS: PROF.OAK,
please visit us!
...
es:
Hay un correro electrónico!

...

¡Aviso a todos los entrenadores de Pokémon!

¡Los entrenadores de élite de la Liga Pokémon están listos para desafiaros a todos! Traed a vuestros mejores Pokémon para ver lo buenos que sois!

Oficina Central de la Liga Pokémon

PD: Profesor Oak, visítenos por favor!

en:
It\cs encyclopedia-
like, but the
pages are blank!
es: Es como una enciclopedia, pero la páginas están en blanco!

en:
That\cs a POKe
BALL. There\cs a
POKeMON inside!
es: Eso es una Poké ball. Dentro de ella hay un Pokémon!

en:
ROUTE 1
PALLET TOWN -
VIRIDIAN CITY

TRAINER TIPS

The battle moves
of POKeMON are
limited by their
POWER POINTs, PP.

To replenish PP,
rest your tired
POKeMON at a
POKeMON CENTER!
es:
Pistas Entrenador

Los ataques del Pokémon dependen de sus Puntos de Poder o PP.

¡Para rellenar los PP, deja que tus Pokémon cansados descansen en un centro Pokémon!

en:
TRAINER TIPS

Catch POKeMON
and expand your
collection!

The more you have,
the easier it is
to fight!

VIRIDIAN CITY
POKeMON GYM

VIRIDIAN CITY
The Eternally
Green Paradise

Wow! Tons of
POKeMON stuff!

ROUTE 3
MT.MOON AHEAD

Beware! ZUBAT is
a bloodsucker!

{Player} turned on
the PC.
Widthdraw
Deposit
Release
See Ya!
BILL\cs PC
NAME\cs PC
PROF. OAK\cs PC
LOG OFF

MOM: Right.
All boys leave
home someday.
It said so on TV.

PROF. OAK, next
door, is looking
for you.

I\cm raising
POKeMON too!

When they get
strong, they can
protect me!

Technology is
incredible!

You can now store
and recall items
and POKEMON as
data via PC!

Hi NAME!
BLUE is out at
Grandpa\cs lab.

OAK: You should
talk to it and
see how it feels.

PROF. OAK is the
authority on
POKeMON!

Many POKeMON
trainers hold him
in high regard!

I study POKeMON as
PROF.OAK\cs AIDE.

Once a POKeMON
learns FLASH, you
can get through
ROCK TUNNEL.

Hi! I work at a POKéMON MART.

It's a convenient shop, so please visit us in VIRIDIAN CITY.

I know, I'll give you a sample! Here you go!
es:
¡Hola! Trabajo en una Tienda Pokémon.

Tenemos muchas cosas. Visítanos en Ciudad Verde.

¡Mira, te daré una muestra!

¡Aquí tienes!

en:
{Player} got
POTION!
We also carry POK챕 BALLS for catching POKéMON!
es: ¡También tenemos Poké balls para capturar los Pokémon!

en:
See those ledges
along the road?

It\cs a bit scary,
but you can jump
from them.

You can get back to PALLET TOWN
quicker that way.

Yawn!
I must have dozed
off in the sun.

I had this dream
about a DROWZEE
eating my dream.
What\cs this?
Where did this TM
come from?

This is spooky!
Here, you can
have this TM.

Those POKeBALLs
at your waist!
You have POKeMON!

It\cs great that
you can carry and
use POKeMON any-
time, anywhere!

You want to know
about the 2 kinds
of caterpillar
POKeMON?

When I go shop in
PEWTER CITY, I
have to take the
winding trail in
VIRIDIAN FOREST.

Hmm? You want me
to show you how
to catch POKeMON
again?

The Gym Leader
is not in...

You can use that
PC in the corner.

The receptionist
told me. So kind!

You dont have
a link cable...

There\cs a POKeMON
CENTER in every
town ahead.

They donct charge
any money either!

The shop finally
has some POTIONs
in stock.

This shop sells a
lot of PARLYSZ
HEALs.

Okay!

Be sure to read
the blackboard
carefully!

Whew! I\cm trying
to memorize all
my notes.

Sis says POKeMON
will become tame
if you treat them
nicely.

Coming up with
nicknames is fun,
but hard.

Simple names are
 the easiest to
remember.

My Daddy loves
POKeMON too.
SPEARY: Tetweet!

The HM FLASH
lights even the
darkest dungeons.

A fainted POKeMON
can\ct fight. But,
it can still use
moves like CUT!

Want to trade
for a MR MIME?

Are you going to
VIRIDIAN FOREST?
Be careful, it\cs
a natural maze!

You have to roam
far to get new
kinds of POKeMON.

Look for other
types outside of
VIRIDIAN FOREST.

Many POKeMON live
only in forests
and caves.
	
You need to look
everywhere to get
different kinds!

Have you noticed
the bushes on the
roadsize?

They can be cut
down by a special
POKeMON move.

There arenct many
serious POKeMON
trainers here!
	
Theycre all like
BUG CATCHERs,
but PEWTER GYM\cs
BROCK is totally
into it!

Psssst!
Do you know what
I\cm doing?

Did you check out
the MUSEUM?

It\cs rumored that
CLEFAIRYs came
from the moon!

They appeared
after MOON STONE
fell on MT.MOON.

POKeMON learn new
techniques as
they grow!

But, some moves
must be taught by
the trainer!

POkeMON become
easier to catch
when they are
hurt or asleep!

But, it\cs not a sure
thing!

Our POKeMON\cs an
outsider, so it\cs
hard to handle.
	
An outsider is a
POKeMON that you
get in a trade.

It grows fast, but
it may ignore an
unskilled trainer
in battle!

If only we had
some BADGEs...
NIDORAN sit!
NIDORAN: Bowbow!

POKeMON CENTERS
are wonderful!

They heal POKeMON
completely.

Even conditions
like sleep, burn,
poison and others
are cured.

Im on the phone
damnit!

Good things can
happen if you
raise POKeMON
diligently, even
the weak ones!

A shady old man
got me to buy
this really weird
fish POKeMON!

It\cs totally weak
and it cost $500!

JIGGLYPUFF:	Puu
pupuu!
